intro: The Phaeton Taghmata operates out the Orthodox Forge World Phaeton in the Segmentum Solar, with an emphasis on Armoured formations. Its armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Taghmata Omnissiah armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments, Collegia Titanica Allied Banners, and Centurio Ordinatus Maniples have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Phaeton Taghmata Maniples have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'The Logic of Victory' special rule. Legio Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Cybernetica Cortex' special rules. Solar Auxilia Allied Sections have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia Lances have an Initiative Rating of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.

formations.name: Adsecularis Tech-thrall Maniple
formations.units: One Tech-Priest Auxilia, five Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts
extraUnits: Add two : 1 U/p
Add two : 1 U/p
Add : 2 U/p each

formations.name: Mechanized Adsecularis Tech-thrall Maniple
formations.units: Four Adsecularis Tech-Thrall Cohorts, one Taghmata Triaros Armoured Conveyor
extraUnits: Add two : 1 U/p
Add two : 1 U/p
Add : 2 U/p each

formations.name: Thallax Maniple
formations.units: Four Thallax Cohorts
extraUnits: Add two : 1 U/p
Add two : 1 U/p
Add : 2 U/p each

sections.name: Phaeton Taghmata Special Maniples
sections.description: May only have one Special Cohort for each Core Cohort

formations.name: Leman Russ Maniple
formations.units: Three Taghmata Leman Russ of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Cortex Controller character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Castellax Assault Maniple
formations.units: Three Charonite Ogryns
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or two Veletarii: 1 U/p

formations.name: Thanatar Siege Maniple
formations.units: Four Thanatar Siege-Automata
extraUnits: Replace four Rapier Laser Destroyer with four Rapier Quad Launchers or four Rapier Mole Mortars: 1 U/p
Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Domitar Maniple
formations.units: Four Tarantula - Lascannon, and/or Tarantula - Hyperios

formations.name: Castellax
formations.units: Three Leman Russ of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Leman Russ of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Battery
formations.units: Three Basilisk and/or Medusa
extraUnits: Add Basilisk and/or Medusa: 1 U/p

sections.name: Phaeton Taghmata Elite Maniple
sections.description: May only have one Elite Section for each two Core Sections

formations.name: Myridon Maniple
formations.units: Two Myridon Secutors, and two Myridon Destructors

formations.name: Heavy Malcador Squadron
formations.units: Two Heavy Malcador Infernus, or two Heavy Malcador Valdor

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Squadron
formations.units: One Baneblade Super-Heavy Tank
extraUnits: Replace the Baneblade with a Hellhammer, Stormblade, or Stormsword (Free), or a Shadowsword (1 U/p)
Add one Auxilia Adjutant character to one unit in the formation: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Leman Russ Company
formations.units: One Auxilia Adjutant character, eight Leman Russ of any configuration

formations.name: Auxilia Artillery Company
formations.units: One Auxilia Adjutant character, eight Basilisk and/or Medusa

sections.name: Imperial Navy Squadrons
sections.description: May only have one Navy Squadron for each two Core or Special Sections

formations.name: Thunderbolt Squadron
formations.units: Two Thunderbolt Fighters
extraUnits: Add up to two Thunderbolt Fighters: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Marauder Squadron
formations.units: Two Marauder Bombers

sections.name: Calth High Guard Offboard Support Assets

formations.name: Warhound
formations.units: One Warhound Scout Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 1 U/p

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans (must have the same armament)
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 2 U/p

formations.name: Reaver
formations.units: One Reaver Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warlord
formations.units: One Warlord Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warmaster
formations.units: One Warmaster Heavy Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace two Battle Weapons with two Support Weapons of the same type (1 U/p)

sections.name: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments
sections.description: The first formation selected must be a Tactical Detachment

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p
Replace up to two Legion Tactical Squads with two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p), or two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p)

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Proteus Land Speeders or Javelin Attack Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Proteus Land Speeder or Javelin Attack Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Predator Detachment
formations.units: Three Predators of any configuration

formations.name: Sicarian Detachment
formations.units: Two Sicarians of any configuration

formations.name: Armiger Lance
formations.units: Three Armiger Knight Warglaives and/or Helverins

formations.name: Questoris Lance
formations.units: Two Questoris Knight Paladins, Crusaders, Errants, Wardens or Gallants. May not mix configurations
extraUnits: Add one Questoris Rocket Pod to each unit in the formation: 1 U/p
